cannabisApplyForLicense.applicationQuestionsText: Answer the two questions below and we can highlight the information you need to prepare for you application on the following page.
cannabisApplyForLicense.priorityStatusText: Based on your preferences in [Determine if You Are Eligible for Priority Status](/tasks/priority-status-cannabis), you are eligible as the following:
cannabisApplyForLicense.priorityStatusNoneSelectedText: You did not select any [priority status designations](/tasks/priority-status-cannabis).
